person.biography: Carroll Culver built and ran a fishing resort (Pt. Lawrence Lodge) at Pt. Lawrence during the 1930s, 40s, and 50s. Born in New Whatcom (now Bellingham), WA in 1904, he lived with his parents in Friday Harbor as a child. Timeline continues with fishing industry work and establishment of Pt. Lawrence Lodge.
